parameters.name: ListenerPort
parameters.description:
The frontend port that is used by the CLB instance.

Valid values: **1 to 65535**.

parameters.name: ListenerProtocol
parameters.description:
The frontend protocol that is used by the CLB instance.

>  This parameter is required if the same port is used by listeners of different protocols.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the Classic Load Balancer (CLB) instance.

To query the region ID, refer to the list of [regions and zones](~~40654~~) or call [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~).
